definition: Lantern Festival/night of 15th of first lunar month/see also 元宵[yuan2 xiao1]
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
night

sentences.english: Night yuan this year, with the lights still on, but not last year, tears wet spring Shanxiu.
sentences.chinese: 今年元夜時，月與燈依舊，不見去年人，淚溼春衫袖。

sentences.english: This time of spring night this year.
sentences.chinese: 去年元夜時，花市燈如晝。

sentences.english: In the Lantern Festival night of this year's.
sentences.chinese: 去年元夜時，花市燈如晝。
